summary: Manages the temporal discretization settings for MODFLOW-6 simulations, encapsulating stress period length, number of timesteps per period, and an optional multiplier for progressive timestep sizing. It supports optional validation and offers utilities for grid compatibility checks, rendering of configuration data, and writing to the TDIS input file.
business_intent: Enables consistent and validated definition of time stepping parameters across groundwater flow models, simplifying model configuration, ensuring compatibility with the MODFLOW-6 TDIS package, and reducing errors in temporal simulation setup.
